creditline: Given in memory of Mildred Light Lohmann
description: three sheets glued together horizontally; waterfront view with three ships and two men in canoe; numerous foreground figures working on a ship, carrying parcels and conversing; five goats on opposite bank; coach drawn by six horses on opposite bank; buildings, pyramids and castle in background; coat of arms and key to landmarks at bottom
provenance:
Mildred Light Lohmann
Carolyn Light Bell, Minneapolis
title: Prospetto dell' alma citta' di Roma (Panoramic View of Rome)
